Import Dfam Query Output

Source: R/read.dfam.R
read.dfam.Rd

Import the output file generated with dfam.query.

read.dfam(dfam.file)

Arguments

dfam.file

path to Dfam output file generated with dfam.query.

Examples

# import example Dfam output
dfam.file <- read.dfam(system.file("example_dfam.out", package = "LTRpred"))

head(dfam.file)
#>     target_name         acc                             query_name  bits
#> 1   Copia1-I_DM DF0001559.0 1_CHROMOSOME_dumped__10696719_10701589  57.8
#> 2       Copia_I DF0001563.0 1_CHROMOSOME_dumped__10696719_10701589 154.8
#> 3   Copia1-I_DM DF0001559.0 1_CHROMOSOME_dumped__11148084_11152830  74.8
#> 4       Copia_I DF0001563.0 1_CHROMOSOME_dumped__11148084_11152830 141.9
#> 5 HelitronY4_CE DF0001412.0 1_CHROMOSOME_dumped__11284903_11295619  49.7
#> 6   Copia1-I_DM DF0001559.0 1_CHROMOSOME_dumped__11789447_11794074 218.6
